text: Lyle Pearce Lovett (born November 1, 1957) is an American country singer- songwriter and actor. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Lyle Lovett Website * * The Thinking Man's Cowboy, by Matt Dellinger, New Yorker, February 23, 2004. * Homeboy, by Alec Wilkinson, New Yorker, February 1, 2004. * Lovett charges ahead with his career - USA Today, May 10, 2002. * Lyle Lovett Trampled by Bull, Hospitalized With Broken Leg - FOX News, March 29, 2002. * Official Lyle Lovett Lost Highway Artist Page * UnOfficial Website/Fan site Category:Singer-songwriters from Texas Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Texas Category:1957 births Category:Living people
title: Lyle Lovett
